statements: DELETE FROM drone_flight_data WHERE id = 1;
DELETE FROM drone_flight_data WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -75.0;
DELETE FROM drone_flight_data WHERE id = 1;
DELETE FROM drone_flight_data WHERE altitude < 500 AND speed > 50;
DELETE FROM DroneFlightData WHERE flight_id = 1;
DELETE FROM DroneAnalysis WHERE analysis_id = 10;
DELETE FROM DroneFlightData WHERE altitude > 100 AND speed < 50;
DELETE FROM DroneAnalysis WHERE flight_id IN (SELECT flight_id FROM DroneFlightData WHERE longitude < -90 ORDER BY altitude DESC);

DELETE FROM DroneAltitude
WHERE drone_id = 1 AND altitude > 1000;

DELETE FROM DroneGPS
WHERE latitude < 50.0 OR longitude > 85.0;
DELETE FROM DroneAltitude WHERE drone_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM DroneGPS WHERE longitude BETWEEN -90.0 AND -80.0 AND timestamp < '2022-02-01' AND drone_id IN (2, 3);
DELETE FROM FlightPath WHERE path_id = 3;
DELETE FROM FlightData WHERE distance > 1000;
DELETE FROM TelemetryData WHERE drone_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM FlightPath WHERE flight_id = 2 AND altitude > 100
DELETE FROM drone_sensors WHERE sensor_id = 100;
DELETE FROM drone_battery WHERE drone_id = 50 AND battery_level < 20;
DELETE FROM drone_flights WHERE id = 1;
DELETE FROM drone_battery WHERE battery_level < 50;
